body.name: XOOL 200 in 1 Precision Screwdriver Kit, Electronics Repair Tool Magnetic Driver Kit with 164 Bits, Flexible Shaft, Extension Rod for Computer, iPhone, Laptop, PC, PS4, Xbox, Nintendo
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 38 mins
features: 【200 in 1 Screwdriver Kit】This electronic screwdriver tool kit includes 2 non-slip screwdriver handles, precision anti-static tweezers, flexible shaft telescopic rod, 164 screwdriver heads, solid shaft telescopic rod, rubber suction cup, black cleaning brush, 14 triangles Paddle, 2 blue double-ended plastic opening tool and 2 pointed opening tool, metal opening tool, magnet, magnetic pad and Oxford cloth bag.

【Best Combination】This electronic repair kit has 164 different bits, a sturdy flexible shaft, opening tool, ESD tweezers, etc. It is not just a complete repair kit for mobile phones, watches, glasses, cameras, tablets, laptops,PC, TVs and other electronic devices. The 1/4 inch bit can be applied to various scenes in life. After a complete redesign, it can provide all the tools you need, but not the tools you don't need.

【High Quality Material】All bits are made of high quality CR-V steel by vulcanization, it's hardness can reach over HRC62°, which is harder than the ordinary steel material and more durable, all of standard size bit undergo the rigorous quality control testing, the tip is stable and not easily stripped.

【Humanized Design】Ergonomic and press & push design handle, it is comfortable to hold even for the long-time use. For the bits that are often used in repairing electronic products, have 2pcs or 3pcs or 4pcs in this set, allows you to avoid damage due to repeated use need to buy a new replacement, save your money. And this precision set comes with a storage bag which is made from oxford, offering a whole protection, easier storage and carrying.

【Extension and Flexible Shaft】There is an adjustable extension rod and a flexible shaft for some electronics where the screws are not on the surface.You no longer need to laboriously open the screws inside the machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suction Power? uhh it's a toolkit
reviews.reviewText: Despite the ratings probably being for shared products, (as in several different products share the same review system as each other, usually to boost apparent amount of sales of a product).This tool kit has been extremely useful, I bought it as I was in need of a kit to work on old gaming consoles and other pieces of hardware that require some specialized screw tips. While there are alooooooot of tips, and I realistically probably will only ever need use of 10% of them, it was still worth it at the price point.at least at the date of purchase a 200 piece kit was barely more expensive than some of the 100 piece similar kits, so hey, why not spend a couple extra dollars for twice the amount.And if a situation comes where a certain tip is needed that I currently have yet to use arrive, at least i'll have it, and not need to buy another kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set of bits
reviews.reviewText: An extremely wide selection of quality bits at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product and good company
reviews.reviewText: This kit has all of the bits I need, and more, to do work on laptops and phones too, it seems. I don't work on phones though, but could possibly start now, or at least have fun tearing apart my old dead phones to see how the kit works.I have a habit of misplacing tool sets and when I needed to tear my laptop apart to replace the fan and keyboard, I couldn't remember where I put my old set of tools, as usual. I decided it was easier and would be faster, to just order another toolkit.I searched on Amazon and found this kit. It has more bits and tools, for more things than I can ever imagine using. Since the kit, to me, was such a great deal with all of the items included, I decided to buy 2, hoping I will be able to find set one or the other in the future, when needed.The price I paid, for this 190 piece kit, was less than I paid for the old kit I currently haven't found. I originally purchased a Webetop Screwdriver Set, 67 piece kit, in 2019 and paid $26.99 for it. The Webetop kit worked good though and if I had found it when needed, I would not have bought the new kit.I was impressed with this new kit. It has a nice holder and has almost 3x's the pieces of my old kit and I paid $25.42. For me, it was an awesome deal. The quality of the parts, in the kit, seem very good. The bits do not seem cheap or low quality. Only time will tell how well they hold up, but no bits last forever if you use them all the time. They wear out and need replacing from time to time.I used one of the kits to tear apart my laptop and had no issues with any of the tools I needed. Each item performed as I expected and in some cases, even better.I like the way the kit is organized and slots labeled. It is nice to have the little magnetic pad to place the screws and even write a note on, if needed. I never bother, it is more fun to guess where the screws go. LOLHaving such a well put together kit/holder, It will be easy to see if I have forgotten something when I am finished using it each time.The only problem with the kits that I did have ....... Unfortunately, one of the tool kits was missing 1 of the 164 bits. It is one that I would probably never use, but it is nice to have the complete kit. I contacted the company to let them know about the missing bit, via the message center here on Amazon. I received a reply from them within a couple of days and within a few days after that, the issue had been fully resolved and i had my 2 complete bit sets. I was impressed by how quickly the company responded and how easily and quickly the problem had been completely resolved. I would not hesitate to order something from them again, if the need should arise in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comprehensive kit of short screwdriver bits, handles, and spudgers.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the product, but I wish there had been a detailed photo of the bits included in the set. There are quite a few very large ones; but many small short ones. I purchased it for smaller work, but there are soooo many bits that I think the bases are covered. I just like to know what I am buying. I made the mistake of not buying the heating pad/pouches for cell phones and iPad's at the same time. If you get one it should be temperature controlled.I wished it had more long small diameter bits than were included. I would gladly have paid more for a set of them to be included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the only set you need
reviews.reviewText: This precision screwdriver kit from XOOL is an absolute gem! With almost every tool you could need for small repairs, it goes above and beyond its electronics repair label. I've even found myself reaching for it during car repairs – talk about versatility!🌟 Pros:Comprehensive Toolkit: With 200 tools at your disposal, it's a one-stop solution for various repairs.Versatility Beyond Electronics: Surprisingly effective for small-scale car repairs, showcasing its adaptability.👎 Cons:Twisting Grip Challenge: The twisting grip can be a bit tricky, especially when dealing with tightly screwed-on screws. The handle twists while the screw head stays in place, creating a challenge in securing the driver in place.In summary, the XOOL 200 in 1 Precision Screwdriver Kit is a must-have for DIY enthusiasts. Whether you're diving into electronics or tackling unexpected car repairs, this toolkit has you covered. Just be mindful of the twisting grip challenge when dealing with stubborn screws. 🔧🛠️🌐"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tool set for electronic repairs
reviews.reviewText: Great kit, comes with everything you would need to work on almost any piece of electronic. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good kit for the price
reviews.reviewText: You get a lot of bits and some of the more useful tools you'll need for phones, laptops, computers, controllers, etc. The drivers are fine, their adjustable mechanism can be helpful but only gets as long as a regular screwdriver so I'm not sure how useful that part is. I ended up replacing my drivers with iFixit drivers as the stock ones are a little scratchy but perfectly usable as it. They The carrying case is nice as well. Definitely a great value. Also, I wouldn't recommend getting it for the bit storage in the 1/4" driver. While functional, it goes too low into the handle to be useful as you have to smack it a couple of times to be able to reach the bits. It is there if you are in a situation where you can't take the case but can take your 1/4" driver so I still count it as a better to have and not need thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lost of pieces
reviews.reviewText: Many pieces that even other sets will not include. For instance, a t30 bit for the 1/4 in driver. It’s almost never included, but when I needed it, it was there. Not a huge fan of the way this case holds the plastic screen guitar pick looking things, cause they fall out all the time, but for someone who doesn’t have a new computer and does some maintenance work to their own electronics, it’s a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Brilliant screwdriver with lots of features.
reviews.reviewText: This was a brilliant buy for the following reasons.* It comes with 200 different bits to connect to the screwdriver. My old screwdrivers were not the right size. However, with this purchase, I found the correct size quickly.* The magnetism means it is very easy to connect the bits to the screwdriver.* The extension to the screwdriver could be useful in the future.* The tool to eject the SIM card, could help me, when I buy a new mobile phone.* It comes with a case to store all the objects.* Excellent value for money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent produit, tout les embouts de tournevis dans un étuis pratique et solide.
reviews.reviewText: Tout les embouts de tournevis de précision et pour l'electronique. Aucun ne manque (philips, triangle, étoile, etc). J'ai pus facilement ouvrir mrs consoles pour le remplacement de batterie et l'autre pour l'upgrade du ssd (les 2 consoles ayant des vis peu communes).Je recommande ce produit de qualité professionelle pour toutes vos operations de précision.
Conforme à la descriptionPlus que complet permet le demontage de tout type de pc et téléphone et aux gadgets électriques iu électroniquesComposant tres solide de bonne qualité

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really good set glad I bought it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A great toolkit for the arsenal
reviews.reviewText: I had a box of various small screwdrivers, many that were freebies that came with installation kits for computer and phone parts. Inevitably, certain laptops or devices would over some weird screw type for which I had no tool.Which led me to this kit. Yes, this has all the Torx and tri-wing shapes as well as a decent range of Phillips. It alway has a good number or pry-tools, prongs and other useful widgets. To be honest, I doubt you'll find an electronic device on the market with a screw this kit can't handle. Overall, it all seems sturdy enough for regular use.Great value for money.
